Angelina Evans is a senior at the University of Iowa. She is pursuing a major in Geography, as well as minors in Computer Science and Environmental Policy and Planning. Angelina is interested in how GIS and data science can be used to change or understand the world as we know it. In the future, Angelina hopes to use her knowledge to identify problems and provide solutions to environmental and social issues related to climate change, disasters, pollution, health, and wellbeing.

This blog is used to document work accomplished for the DSPG summer of 2023 program.
